tags: Closed-Contact-Us: For Issue Related to Technical Bidding and all Vendor Queries  D, Maison DUFAY, 346A Ontario St, Kingston ON I 1601013 contact Tel: 1706-108185
full_summary:
===============

### Request for Proposal: VMMB Groundskeeping Services

**[ID: cb-712-57821467]**

#### Summary of Proposal

The Canadian Museum of Nature is inviting experienced and qualified firms to submit a proposal for providing groundskeeping services for the Victoria Memorial Museum Building (VMMB), located at 240 McLeod Street in Ottawa, Ontario.

#### Services to be Provided

The required services include year-round landscaping, civil maintenance, snow and ice control, and site waste operations. These services are to be carried out in accordance with the specifications outlined in the attached documents.

#### Tender Details

* Tender reference number: cb-712-57821467
* Amendment number: 1
* Solicitation number: 23-195-RFP
* Publication date: 2024-03-28
* Tender closing date: 2024-04-23T16:00:00
* Amendment date: 2024-04-23
* Expected contract start date: 2024-06-01
* Expected contract end date: 2027-05-31
* Tender status: Expired

#### Performance Criteria

The tender call requires bidders to providequotes based on their understanding of the terms and conditions outlined in the attached documentation. The evaluation criterion is based on a combined score of technical merit and price.

#### Important Notes

* Tender submissions must be made electronically via the Bonfire platform ([https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca](https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca)).
* All bidders must register on the Bonfire platform and create an online profile before submitting their proposal.
* Technical help is available by calling 1-800-354-8010 ext. 2 or submitting a request on the Bonfire platform.berra applicaiton

#### Contact Information

Michelle Garber
Approvisionnement Procurement
Canadian Museum of Nature
700 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, ON K1M 0C9
email: aprovisionnement-procurement@nature.ca, phone: (613) 566-4240

Please note that the Canadian Museum of Nature reserves the right to reject any bid or cancel the tender process at their discretion. All bidders must agree to the terms and conditions outlined in the tender documentation.

END.
